title: Bugsplats
body: Every time i go into my loot i get a bugsplat.. it just started happening too so idk what to do lol please help

replies.body:
Bugsplats usually indicate that there's something going on with your system drivers or hardware that causes a poor interaction between your PC and the client. I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions for this problem.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
